content: Yes, April Fools... but epic form to change your homepage -- https://www.epic.com/
There's some really funny stuff on that page. Kudos to the Epic Marketing/Web teams
the original marketing team, or the newly promoted marketing team?
I'm assuming original marketing team, the devs are still being trained.

My favorite was a few years ago when they claimed that Hillary Clinton's original campaign slogan was suppose to be in support of electronic records as "I'm with EHR" but an intern didn't catch the Microsoft autocorrect which changed it to "I'm with HER"
